price: 你们当为主道而施舍，你们不要自投于灭亡。你们应当行善；安拉的确喜爱行善的人。
arabic: وَأَنفِقُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَا تُلۡقُواْ بِأَيۡدِيكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلتَّهۡلُكَةِ وَأَحۡسِنُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wa-anfiqū fī sabīli al-lahi walā tul'qū bi-aydīkum ilā al-tahlukati wa-aḥsinū inna al-laha yuḥibbu al-muḥ'sinīna
